feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-22T13:53:48.304325Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;我以为我想成为一名教授，然后我在招聘委员会任职（2021）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.science.org/content/article/i-thought-i-wanted-be-faculty-member-the n-i-served-hiring-committee</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T11:53:20.213569Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.science.org/content/article/i-thought-i-wanted-be-faculty-member-then-i-served-hiring-committee"/>; <author>; <name>;ykonstant</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=ykonstant</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-thought-i-wanted-to-be-a-professor-then-i-served-on-a-hiring-committee-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36825204" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MSX-DOS</stitle>; <id>;https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MSX-DOS</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T09:53:20.226 432Z</updated>; <link href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MSX-DOS"/>; <author>; <name>;pavlov</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pavlov</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;MSX-DOS 是 Microsoft 为 8 位家用计算机标准 MSX 开发的已停产磁盘操作系统。它是 MS-DOS v1.25 和 CP/M-80 v2.2 之间的交叉版本。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#msx-dos" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36797650" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;十月os – HTML动态壁纸引擎</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/underpig1/octos</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T09:53:20.229726Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/underpig1/octos"/>; <author>; <name>;underpig1</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=underpig1</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/underpig1/octos/master/img/tray.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;在 Windows 上创建、分发和探索使用 HTML、CSS 和 JS 制作的实时交互式壁纸。 Octos 目前处于开发的早期阶段。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#octos-html-live-wallpaper-engine" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36824595" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;苹果的交互式电视盒：破解 ROM 中的机顶盒系统 7.1</stitle>; <id>;http://oldvcr.blogspot.com/2023/07/apples-interactive-television-box.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T05:53:20.230976Z</updated>; <link href="http://oldvcr.blogspot.com/202 3/07/apples-interactive-television-box.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;todsacerdoti </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEgT5ldv1fTGlQrFw P9YveESyKNAoqxHlTII0uFm4NYQRJ8gvKaGvGh0Y-2mgZNL9w-TNhZFhb77W_OvZDlmPvrRHmvLf4xlIUXLH7BbsJuOEtCPRKP3-6T3W6rUgrGEo7FDsFNujaetgxrK0BHIovLKHTwsw6njPPheMKDQF NUAv33t3jrMOxvq3HO8Ez8U/s320/PXL_20230709_004451960.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 166px;" />;<br />;Apple 交互式电视盒 (AITB) 是 Apple 在 20 世纪 90 年代开发的一款机顶盒。它设计为在 T1/E1 线路或 CD 上运行，基于 Quadra 605 硬件。但是，AITB 从未推出零售，大多数设备都被召回和销毁。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apple-s-interactive-television- box-hacking-the-set-top-box-system-7-1-in-rom" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36823565" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;放置CPU中的“你”</stitle>; <id>;https://cpu.land/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T05:53:20.233165Z</updated>; <link href="https://cpu.land/"/>; <author>; <name>;uneekname</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=uneekname</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://cpu.land/orpheus-flag.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;作者对程序在计算机上运行时发生的情况的了解存在差距。他们进行了研究，现在对计算机从启动到程序执行的工作方式有了更好的了解。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#putting-the-you-in-cpu" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=3682 3605" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ElKaWe – 电热热泵</stitle>; <id>;https://www.fraunhofer.de/en/research/lighthouse-projects-fraunhofer-initiatives/fraunhofer-lighthouse-projects/elkawe.html</ id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T05:53:20.234152Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.fraunhofer.de/en/research/lighthouse-projects-fraunhofer-initiatives/fraunhofer-lighthouse-projects/elkawe.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;danans</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=danans </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.fraunhofer.de/en/research/lighthouse-projects-fraunhofer-initiatives/fraunhofer-lighthouse-projects/elkawe/jcr:content/stage/stageParsys/stage_slide/image.img.jpg/1574244502657/ElKaWe-KV-web.jpg" style="width: 220像素； height: 84px;" />;<br />;ElKaWe 灯塔项目旨在开发比传统压缩机热泵更高效、更环保的电热热泵。科学家们正在研究陶瓷和聚合物基电热材料以及高效散热的创新系统方法。该项目旨在展示电热热泵长期替代压缩机的潜力。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#elkawe-electriccaloric-heat-pump s" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36823524" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Plane – 开源 Jira 替代品</stitle>; <id>;https://plane.so</id >; <更新>;2023-07-22T08:53:20.235412Z</更新>; <link href="https://plane.so"/>; <作者>; <name>;prhrb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=prhrb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://plane-marketing.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws .com/plane-assets/icons/youtube.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 162px;" />;<br />;开源项目管理工具，可安心管理问题、冲刺和产品路线图。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#plane-open-source-jira-alternative" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36824450" target="_blank">; [comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;图表中的 AWS 网络概念</stitle>; <id>;https://miparnisariblog.wordpress.com/2023/03/29/aws-networking-concepts/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T05:53:20.2365 06Z</updated>; <link href="https://miparnisariblog.wordpress.com/2023/03/29/aws-networking-concepts/"/>; <作者>; <name>;mparnisari</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mparnisari</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://miparnisariblog.files.wordpress.com/2023 /03/image.png?w=1024" style="宽度: 220px; height: 201px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了作者为理解 AWS VPC 仪表板所做的努力以及他们为了解网络资源所做的努力。他们发现 AWS 中可能存在多种类型的连接。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#aws-networking-concepts-in-a-diagram" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =36823516" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;当我们谈论系统设计时我们谈论什么</stitle>; <id>;https://maheshba.bitbucket.io/blog/2023/07/12/Design.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07 -22T04:53:20.237732Z</updated>; <link href="https://maheshba.bitbucket.io/blog/2023/07/12/Design.html"/>; <author>; <name>;scv119</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=scv119</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;用抽象对抗复杂性的设计过程在以下方面是有效的：解决现实世界的问题。设计的后期绑定、讨论设计空间以及并行设计和开发过程是要遵循的关键规则。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-we-talk-about-when-we-talk-about-system-design" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36823375" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;互联网搜索提示</stitle>; <id>;https://gwern.net/search</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T03:53:20.239860Z</updated>; <link href="https://gwern.net/search"/>; <author>; <name>;herbertl</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=herbertl</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://gwern.net/doc/technology/google/gwern-googlesearch-tools-daterange.png" style="width: 220px; height: 145px;" />;<br />;随着时间的推移，我在网上查找参考文献、论文和书籍方面积累了一定的谷歌能力和专业知识。其中一些技巧并不为人所知，例如在互联网档案馆 (IA) 中查找书籍。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#internet-search-tips" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36822880" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">; Biotumen：沥青重塑</stitle>; <id>;https://biofabrik.com/biotumen/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T08:53:20.240834Z</updated>; <link href="https://biofabrik.com/biotumen/"/>; <author>; <name>;patall</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=patall</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://biofabrik.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/Biofabrik-Headquarter-711x400.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了环境领域初创企业数量的增加，并宣布与 BAYERNOIL Raffineriegesellschaft mbH 达成商业协议。它还提到澳大利亚第一座 WASTX 塑料系列工厂的调试。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#biotumen-bitumen-reinvented" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36824330" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;将失败作为核心生活技能</stitle>; <id>;https://buildinghealthier.substack.com/p/confronting-failure-as-a-core-life</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T00:53:20.241888Z</updated>; <link href="https://buildinghealthier.substack.com/p/confronting-failure-as-a-core-life"/>; <author>; <name>;blh75</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=blh75</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2 Fpublic%2Fimages%2F627efde7-8e44-414c-9cf3-32ba9d1649c4_3223x4000.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：274px；" />;<br />;一年前，作者在旧金山工作，但现在他们在越南反思他们失败的数字健康公司。他们过去常常针对有关自己失败的问题制定类似营销活动的回应，但现在他们抓住了就此进行真诚对话的机会。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#confronting-failure-as-a-core-life-skill" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36784114" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;辛普森风扇种植托马科 (2003)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.simpsonsarchive.com/news/tomacco.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T09:53:20.242942Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.simpsonsarchive.com/news/tomacco.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;pipeline_peak</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pipeline_peak</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.simpsonsarchive.com/news/tomacco1.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 166px;" />;<br />;奥斯威戈湖的一位辛普森粉丝成功种植了带有烟草根的番茄植株，培育出了含有尼古丁的番茄植株。该植物的果实现在直径为 1.7 英寸，将测试尼古丁含量。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#simpson-fan-grows-tomacco-2003" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36824856" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Bun v0.7.0</stitle>; <id>;https://bun.sh/blog/bun-v0.7.0</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T06:53:20.243988Z</updated>; <link href="https://bun.sh/blog/bun-v0.7.0"/>; <author>; <name>;sshroot</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sshroot</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/709451/254804727-725bf67c-c60f-4eec-b472-07d52b650a93.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 143px; ” />;<br />;Bun v0.7.0 在 Node.js 兼容性方面是一个巨大的飞跃。它是一个令人难以置信的快速 JavaScript 运行时、捆绑器、转译器和包管理器。 Bun 现在支持 Worker，实现 AsyncLocalStorage，并为内存受限环境提供了一个新的 CLI 标志 --smol。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bun-v0-7-0" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36823723" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;过度放牧和荒漠化是叙利亚草原战争的根源（2015）</stitle>; <id>;https://theecological.org/2015/jun/05/over-grazing-and-desertification-syrian-steppe-are-root-causes-war</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T09:53:20.245171Z</updated>; <link href="https://theecological.org /2015/jun/05/over-grazing-and-desertification-syrian-steppe-are-root-causes-war"/>; <author>; <name>;joveian</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=joveian</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://theecologies.org/sites/default/files/styles/landscape_m/public/NG_media/4 00414.jpg?itok=xwyH67Cx" style="宽度：220px；高度：135px；" />;<br />;叙利亚草原的过度放牧和荒漠化，以及经济自由化、失业、腐败和缺乏自由，是叙利亚战争的根源。由于传统放牧方式的中断和城市投资者不可持续的工业实践造成草原生态退化，导致土壤肥力下降和荒漠化加剧。这场生态危机，加上农业系统的崩溃和政府未能应对人道主义危机，引发了 2011 年的起义。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#over-grazing-and-desertification-in-the-syrian-steppe-root-causes-of-war-2015" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=36824607" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在 Windows NT 网络配置中使用 Prolog (1996)</stitle>; <id>;https://web.archive.org/web/20030218034509/http://www.research.microsoft.com /research/dtg/davidhov/pap.htm</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T00:53:20.246275Z</更新>; <link href="https://web.archive.org/web/20030218034509/http://www.research.microsoft.com/research/dtg/davidhov/pap.htm"/>; <作者>; <姓名>;zdw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zdw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Microsoft 的 Windows NT 操作系统使用嵌入式 Prolog 解释器来配置其本地和广域网系统。描述了解决管道问题的算法，包括其正向和负向约束、Prolog 数据库和效率考虑。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#using-prolog-in-windows-nt-network-configuration-1996" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821871" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;压力和真空腌制不起作用（2016）</stitle>; <id>;https://genuineideas.com/ArticlesIndex/Pressuremarinade.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T02:53:20.247744Z</updated>; <link href="https://genuineideas.com/ArticlesIndex/Pressuremarinade.html"/>; <author>; <name>;OJFord</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=OJFord</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://genuineideas.com/Assets/imageassets/incompressible_matrix.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 121px;" />;<br />;压力和真空腌制对肉类不起作用。肉几乎是不可压缩的，并且没有空的气孔，因此不可能将腌料拉入内部。真空腌泡特别无效，因为当肉基质收缩时，在真空步骤中吸入的任何腌泡汁都会被排出。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#Pressure-and-vacuum-marination-does-not-work-2016" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36783937" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;发现：金属可以自我修复</stitle>; <id>;https://newsreleases.sandia.gov/healing_metals/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T02:53:20.248725Z</updated>; <link href="https://newsreleases.sandia.gov/healing_metals/"/>; <author>; <name>;bobvanlu ijt</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bobvanluijt</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://newsreleases.sandia.gov/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/CFB1795-scaled.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;科学家观察到金属碎片在没有人为干预的情况下破裂并重新融合在一起，这对科学理论提出了挑战。如果这种现象能够被利用，它可能会导致发动机、桥梁和飞机的自我修复，从而使它们更安全、更耐用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#discovery-metals-can-heal-themselves" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36822530" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;撒旦的 Spawn() (2018)</stitle>; <id>;https://tavianator.com/2018/spawn_of_satan.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T06:53:20.250820Z</updated>; <link href="https://tavianator.com/2018/spawn_of_satan.html"/>; <作者>; <name>; ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Unix 哲学是关于小程序，它们可以很好地完成一件事，但可以轻松地协同完成复杂的事情。 Unix 编程中的 fork() 和 exec() 函数允许创建和执行新进程，提供灵活性和自定义选项。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#spawn-of-satan-2018" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36783509" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;Llama：添加基于语法的采样</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp/pull/1773</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T21:53:20.252490Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp/pull/1773"/>; <author>; <name>;davepeck </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=davepeck</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2420543/250365685-5bd15da2-78c1-4625-be90-1e938e6823f1.gif" style="width: 220px ；高度：110px；" />;<br />;本文介绍了一个 API，它采用序列化的上下文无关语法来指导和约束采样。它还提供了一个类似 Backus-Naur 形式 (BNF) 的语法示例，用于指定生成的语法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llama-add-grammar-based-sampling" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36819906" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Bfs 3.0：迄今为止最快的查找</stitle>; <id>;https://tavianator.com/2023/bfs_3.0.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T00:53:20.256156Z</updated>; <link href="https://tavianator.com/2023/bfs_3.0.html"/>; <author>; <name>;rurban</ name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rurban</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Bfs 3.0 是一种通过文件系统进行广度优先搜索的工具。新版本包括异步、并行目录遍历，使其比以前的版本和 GNU find 更高效、更快。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bfs-3-0-the-fastest-find-yet" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36783449" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;要掌握不平等程度，看相对富裕的地区</stitle>; <id>;https://blogs.lse.ac.uk/politicsandpolicy/to-grasp-the-extent-of-inequality-look-at-the-relatively-well-off/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T12:53:20.257733Z</updated>; <link href="https:// blogs.lse.ac.uk/politicsandpolicy/to-grasp-the-extent-of-inequality-look-at-the-relatively-well-off/"/>; <author>; <name>;ksey3</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ksey3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blogsmedia.lse.ac.uk/blogs.dir/8/files /2020/07/LSE-Logo_Master-File_RGB_Txt_Wht_e0112b-1.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：75px；" />;<br />;人们对其相对收入的主观看法往往与现实不符。了解这些看法对于理解英国的不平等非常重要。定量研究将人口分为收入群体，例如收入最高的 10% 和收入最低的 40%，但这可能会忽视不平等的重要方面。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#to-grasp-the-extent-of-inequality-look-at-the-relatively-well-off" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36825675" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FBI 对美国参议员不当使用 702 监视权力</stitle>; <id>;https://thehill.com/homenews/administration/4110850-fbi-improperly-used-702-surveillance-powers-on-us-senator/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T02:53:20 .258721Z</updated>; <link href="https://thehill.com/homenews/administration/4110850-fbi-improperly-used-702-surveillance-powers-on-us-senator/"/>; <作者>; <name>;ramblenode</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ramblenode</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://i0.wp.com/thehill.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2023/07/AP910776172115-e1689375358323.jpg?w=2000&ssl=1" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;根据法庭记录，联邦调查局不当使用监视权力来搜查有关美国参议员、州议员和州法官的信息。外国情报监视法院 (FISC) 的意见中记录了 FBI 对《外国情报监视法》第 702 条的使用，这肯定会给情报界带来挑战。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fbi-improperly-used-702-surveillance-powers-on-us-senator" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36822654" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;受损的 Microsoft 密钥：比我们想象的影响更大</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wiz.io/blog/storm-0558-compromished-microsoft-key-enables-authentication-of-countless-micr</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T03:53:20.259768Z</updated>; <link href ="https://www.wiz.io/blog/storm-0558-compromished-microsoft-key-enables-authentication-of-countless-micr"/>; <作者>; <名称>;882542F3884314B</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=882542F3884314B</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://www.datocms-assets.com/75231/1689885318-research_blog_post_cover.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;Microsoft 和 CISA 披露了一起安全事件，威胁行为者获取了私有加密密钥，并用它来伪造 Outlook Web Access 和 Outlook.com 的访问令牌。泄露的密钥比最初想象的更强大，允许威胁参与者伪造多种类型的 Azure Active Directory 应用程序的访问令牌。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#compromished-microsoft-key-more-impactful-than-we-thought" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36823007" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;“最好的蓝莓”：一种微小的北美水果如何占领澳大利亚（2022 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/food/2022/oct/29/the-best-blueberry-how-a-tiny-north-american-fruit-took-over-australia</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T23:53:20。 260883Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/food/2022/oct/29/the-best-blueberry-how-a-tiny-north-american-fruit-took-over-australia"/>; <作者>; <name>;小牛</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=calf</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/b26d00b62f1ebbeb299aaa2647c209a93f708c0c/0_203_6016_3610/master/6016.jpg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none" style="宽度：220px；高度：132px；" />;<br />;澳大利亚培育的蓝莓品种尤里卡 (Eureka) 荣获三星级高级口味奖。过去五年，澳大利亚的蓝莓产量增加了两倍，而且几乎全年种植。蓝莓已成为一种需求量很大的流行超级食品。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-best-blueberry-how-a-tiny-north-american-fruit-took-over-australia-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36797636" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </提要>;
